dict.acceptation: 便宜的，廉价的；劣质的，低劣的；小气的，可鄙的；

sent.orig: Cheryl's chilly cheap chip shop sells Cheryl's cheap chips.
sent.trans: 雪露的便宜辣椒薯条店卖便宜的薯条。

sent.orig: Cheap things are not good; good things are not cheap.
sent.trans: 好货不便宜，便宜无好货。

sent.orig: Cheap energy, specifically cheap oil, quite literally fueled this record economic expansion.
sent.trans: 廉价的能源，特别是廉价的石油，确实促成了空前的经济高涨。

sent.orig: He made cars cheap, cheap enough so that every family could afford one.
sent.trans: 他使汽车非常便宜，便宜到每个家庭都可以买一辆。

sent.orig: TAIDEA Cheap Knife Sharpener design of small size, price cheap and easy for carrying.
sent.trans: TAIDEA经济型快速磨刀器体积小巧，价格低廉，易于携带。
